name: Power Crystal Diggers In Space 2055
description:
A game where you collect crystals on distant planets as a businessman.

Made for #krassjam 5! 

By Zach Sarette in 2018!

Controls:

Game pad:     D pad\Left Analog to move, Xbox A, PS X, Nintendo B for Action, Start for Pause

Keyboard: Arrow Keys to move, SPACE bar for action, ESC for Pause 

Enjoy!
